Package stars

Class Student_details

java.lang.Object
stars.Student_details
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlatFileObject
public class Student_details
extends java.lang.Object
implements FlatFileObject
A class that holds the details regarding a student who uses the Stars system. A student can be enrolled into courses through the Stars system.
Since:
2020/11/14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Low Wei Xian, Lai Ming Hui
